text: Balia baboola mbu; “Nyasaye akhulachile mbu khulasuubila Omurumwa yesiyesi tawe okhuula okhurusilie eshihanwa(isolo) isambwe nende omulilo.” Baboolele mbu; “Abarumwa babetsela nende ebifune biabulafu nende shinga kamurebanga kano, kho shichila shina nimubera toto nimuba nimuboolanga obulaamba.”
